about_the_game:
Nuclear Tides is a minimalist tower defense game. After the nuclear apocalypse, the isolated island is filled with radiation. Clear the radiation and build structures and turrets during the day, and defend your base against the onslaught of nuclear tides at night. Game features include：

  • Procedurally generated initial land plots.

  • Dozens of different land plots include buildings, turrets, and wonders. Most of the time, two identical plots can be combined to form a higher-level plot.

  • The synergistic effects of turrets

  • Be mindful not to let emissions get too high, or it will lead to disaster. Find a balance between economy, defense, and the environment.
